translation.en: There is enough fish for everyone.
-You have to serve me first. -No, I was here first.
translation.ko: - 나 먼저 줘야지 - 아니, 내가 먼저 왔어

translation.en: Ekah, you need to serve me. I live far off.
translation.ko: 에카, 나 먼저 줘야지 우리 집은 멀잖아

translation.en: Yes, yes, I know who came first and who was last.
translation.ko: 누가 먼저 왔고 누가 마지막에 왔는지 다 알아요

translation.en: OK, let's do this-- whoever stands in line, will get extra fish.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 이렇게 하죠 줄 서는 사람한테 더 드릴게요

translation.en: [in English] See, take this one. [in Kamtok] Buy something for yourself.
Keep it! You need it more than I do.
This business would be nothing without you.
[in English] Thank you. [in Kamtok] Thank you.
[in English] We'll go house. We'll go house.
Because the fish is well roasted.
[in English] You know why we give you the name, Ekah?
translation.ko: 널 에카라고 이름 지은 이유를 아니?

translation.en: Why'd we give you that name?
[in Kamtok] Because it was your mother's name.
When I look at you, all I see is my mother.
[in English] Even the way you burn this fish, you burn it like my mama.
translation.ko: 이 생선 굽는 것만 봐도 엄마랑 똑같아

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't take care of you,
I want you to know, our hard work,
translation.ko: 알아 두렴 우리가 열심히 일하는 건

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If you ask for the top three fish people in this village... [in English] ...they will call my name.
translation.ko: 여기서 최고의 어부 셋을 꼽으라면 내 이름이 나오게 될 거다

translation.en: And when they call my name, they will call your name, too.
translation.ko: 내 이름을 꼽으면 네 이름도 꼽게 될 거야

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Keep up the good work.
Papa, if I ask you something...
You be like your mommy plenty now?
[in English] I be like my mama plenty.
[in Kamtok] Do you love my mother?
You are too young to understand.
translation.ko: 넌 너무 어려서 이해 못 해

translation.en: [in English] When you grow, we will talk.
[in Kamtok] I don't want to ever leave you.
This can never happen to you.
You will not be a slave, in any man's house.
The teacher is waiting for her fish. Rush there.
translation.ko: 선생님이 생선 기다리겠다 어서 가 봐

translation.en: [in English] This fish is too small.
[in Kamtok] That's how you always buy it.
[in English] Are you kidding me? This fish is small.
translation.ko: 얘 진짜 웃기네 이 생선은 작은 거 맞아

translation.en: I've been buying from Solomon, he should understand.
translation.ko: 매번 사는데 모르겠어? 솔로몬은 이해할 거야

translation.en: [Solomon, in Kamtok] The teacher wasn't in school?
[in English] Then why waste time so?
[in Kamtok] Papa, I saw kids singing school songs. I love it.
translation.ko: 애들이 교가 부르는 거 구경했어요 맘에 들던데요

translation.en: How much Kiki's mother owe us?
[in English] Six thousand five hundred, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Huh, go and call your Uncle Lucas.
Tell him to come fast... Let's go and collect that debt.
translation.ko: 빨리 오라고 해 그 빚 받으러 가자

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She might die very soon.
Die with all of that education?
You sound like education is important.
Only lazy and stupid people go to school.
translation.ko: 게으르고 멍청한 사람들만 학교 가 시간과 돈 낭비야

translation.en: Everyone I know in this village, who dared to be educated is poor, ma.
translation.ko: 이 마을에서 내가 아는 교육받은 사람은 전부 가난해

translation.en: See, eh, that lazy boy, Peter. [in Kamtok] He still lives with his parents.
translation.ko: 사례를 들어 줄까? 게으른 피터는 아직 부모님과 살지

translation.en: [in English] Joe too, the same thing.
[in Kamtok] Foolish Barbara decided to join them, too.
Barbara's case is heart-breaking. [in English] A long story.
She went to school to study, and instead got pregnant.
translation.ko: 공부하러 학교에 갔다가 임신이나 하고 왔잖아

translation.en: [girl, in Kamtok] Mama, you know I hate school.
I prefer to be a fish girl rather than go to school.
Or even get married like Aunty Rita.
I will buy you garri, so you can eat it with fish.
[in Kamtok] Solo, how did you find this beautiful place?
translation.ko: 솔로 이런 아름다운 곳은 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: [in English] I'm a fisherman! I'm a fisherman!
[in Kamtok] It was here... [in English] ...when my papa ask my mama, if they can marry.
[in Kamtok] Yes, it is very beautiful.
And the way I like you,
only in calculator it will show up.
[in Kamtok] ...even a calculator cannot show it.
[in Kamtok] You know, I cannot make a good family, if I don't have a good wife.
translation.ko: 좋은 아내가 없으면 좋은 가족을 이룰 수 없어

translation.en: [in English] You are the woman who done touched my heart.
Any time I look inside your eyes,
my body just makes some kind...
I want you to be my woman.
Be my woman, we could make some fine family, me and you.
translation.ko: 내 여자가 되어 줘 멋진 가족을 꾸릴 수 있을 거야

translation.en: That I dream about, you know, ever since...
-[in Kamtok] Is that a yes? -[in English] Yes!
[in Kamtok] You see why I say you melt my heart?
Thank you for the beautiful shoes. I like them a lot.
translation.ko: 예쁜 신발 고마워 정말 마음에 들어

translation.en: [in English] Ah! I could do everything for my Barbara.
[Ekah, in Kamtok] What is she saying?
and one pen, can change the world."
translation.ko: '그리고 연필 한 자루면 세상을 바꿀 수 있다'

translation.en: "If one man can destroy the world,
[in Kamtok] Wh-- What is her name?
This is what killed your mother.
I will buy you a new fish barn next month. OK?
translation.ko: 다음 달에 생선 묶는 끈 새로 사줄게

translation.en: So you can roast fish very well.
translation.ko: 그러면 더 잘 구울 수 있을 거다

translation.en: Your father go, see a friend.
Ekah. -[in Kamtok] Yes, uncle. -You are a very good child.
translation.ko: - 에카, 넌 정말 착한 아이야 - 네, 삼촌

translation.en: If one of my three boy, them, they cook like you so,
translation.ko: 내 아들 셋 중 하나라도 너처럼 열심히 일했다면

translation.en: I would have been a happy man.
[in Kamtok] Your father is very respected here,
[in English] No change, eh. [in Kamtok] You should never change.
Have you ever asked yourself why all these educated kids are poor?
translation.ko: 교육을 받은 사람마다 왜 다 가난한지 궁금하지 않니?

translation.en: You understand? They are very lazy kids.
Has an educated person ever bought fish from you,

translation.ko: 이러쿵저러쿵 흥정 같은 것도 안 하지 않냐?

translation.en: They are poor. We even feed them.
translation.ko: 그 사람들 가난해 우리가 먹여 살려

translation.en: Stay just the way you are. We like you as you are.
[in Kamtok] Let nobody deceive you with education. Education is bad for women.
translation.ko: 교육 어쩌고 하는 말에 속지 마라 교육은 여자한테 안 좋아

translation.en: -[both in Kamtok] How are you? -I'm all right.
He says I will start school on Monday.
I don't want to go to school. Please, give me an excuse to tell him.
translation.ko: 난 학교 가기 싫어 둘러댈 변명 없을까?

translation.en: Sorry, I have to go. We'll talk some other time.
[in English] Why you wake up late, so?
[in Kamtok] You had too much work yesterday?
The new kick-starter is working fine.
-What did you say? -Where is your father?
[woman in Kamtok] Please serve my fish, I have to go.
Madam, I beg you. If you can't wait, then you go to a different place.
[in English] I said, if you no feel wait, then you go different place.
[in Kamtok] I'm leaving. [in English] Give my money.
[in Kamtok] Didn't I pay you? [in English] Give my balance.
Madam, I beg no just start.
[in Kamtok] You never give me nothing, and you can't trick me. Never!
translation.ko: 돈 같은 거 안 주셨잖아요 전 절대 못 속여요

translation.en: -Madam, please don't be mad. -If not for you, I would have left.
translation.ko: - 기분 푸세요, 손님 - 아저씨 보고 온 거예요

translation.en: -I'll serve you-- she forgot. -It is only because of you.
Don't be angry, please understand. I have heard you.
[in Kamtok] So, she even has the change.
Please don't be angry. Please understand.
[in Kamtok] This is a joke, right? [in English] You know time?
[in Kamtok] Lucas, I didn't come here to joke with you.
translation.ko: 루커스 농담 따먹기나 하러 온 거 아녜요

translation.en: You can't ask for a debt, at this time.
translation.ko: 이런 시간에 빚 받으러 오는 건 아니지

translation.en: I gave you the money in these times.
[in Kamtok] Based on calculations, I can only pay you next month.
translation.ko: 내 계산에 따르면 다음 달에나 갚을 수 있어

translation.en: I don't have the money now.
[in Kamtok] Lucas, enough of your stupid jokes.
I am not joking. I don't have money. Next month.
translation.ko: 농담 아니야, 돈이 없어 다음 달에 줄게

translation.en: Lucas, you are a liar. [in English] Lucas, you lie.
[in Kamtok] Don't we see you selling coconut water by the sea every day?
translation.ko: 바닷가에서 매일 장사하는 거 모를 거 같아요?

translation.en: [in English] Who give you the power to come to my compound, and curse me?
I do owe you? [in Kamtok] Lucas, Mustapha is telling the truth.
You cannot dribble me like Samuel Eto'o, on a football pitch.
translation.ko: 사뮈엘 에토의 드리블처럼 누굴 속일 생각은 하지 마요

translation.en: Lucas, if you don't pay my money...
[in English] You come my house, you can't threaten me.
[in English] I go cover my eye...
I'll count from one to five.
[in Kamtok] When I open my eyes, and you're still here,
translation.ko: 눈을 떴을 때도 너희가 있으면 맹세컨대

translation.en: one of you will be dead.
translation.ko: 둘 중 하나는 죽을 줄 알아

translation.en: Eh, what is this? [in Kamtok] You don't know how to joke?
[in English] Eh, my brother. [in Kamtok] Let's fix this like men...
[in Kamtok] My brother, you will be dead if you don't pay my money.
translation.ko: 내 돈 갚든가 아니면 황천길로 보내드리죠

translation.en: [in Kamtok] The money is in my pocket.
[in Kamtok] Let's fix this like brothers.
[in English] Sule, that's all I have. I tell you... you give me some time, no?
translation.ko: 술레, 그게 다야 시간을 조금만 줘

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That's all I have right now.
Lucas, you must finish paying me my money.
translation.ko: 루커스, 이제 내 돈 갚아야 해요

translation.en: [in English] OK. You go take firewood?
You're not gonna need to buy firewood again for two year.
[in Kamtok] Drink it while it's still hot.
It will cure your cough. Drink it.
[in Kamtok] Is something disturbing you? You look worried.
The misunderstanding with that woman should not disturb you.
translation.ko: 그 여자랑 실랑이했던 건 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: Do you understand? Don't worry, drink up.
Drink it before it gets cold [in English] Drink.
I want to go to school.
School is not for fish people like we.
translation.ko: 학교는 우리 같은 어부가 다니는 곳 아니야

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That is a bad idea.
What will those same people say...
when I go to school and start making money?
translation.ko: 돈을 벌기 시작하면 그 사람들이 뭐라고 할까?

translation.en: I mean, a lot of money.
Nobody in this house would need to go fishing, every day, 24/7.
translation.ko: 이 집의 누구도 밤낮으로 고기 잡지 않아도 될 거야

translation.en: Our lives would be changed forever.
They say, a blind person cannot lead another.
translation.ko: 앞이 안 보이는 이가 타인을 이끌 순 없어

translation.en: [in Kamtok] What would happen when we got old and couldn't go fishing?
translation.ko: 늙어서 고기를 못 잡는 날이 오면 어떻게 될까?

translation.en: God has blessed us with just one kid.
translation.ko: 신은 우리에게 아이도 겨우 하나만 주셨어

translation.en: What God has blessed us with, is fishing.
[in English] You say you want to go to school...
You asked me the other time, if I like your mama.
[in Kamtok] Do you want to know the answer now?
[in English] I never ever liked my skin.
[in Kamtok] Every love and care I had...
I gave it to your mother.
When my mother and brother Lucas
tried to say anything bad about her,
I kicked my mother out of the house.
Nobody loves your mother more than me.
translation.ko: 나보다 네 엄마를 사랑하는 사람은 없어

translation.en: You don't love her more than I do.
It seems the devil took over her.
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 악마한테 홀렸던 것 같아

translation.en: She started talking to me like a mad woman.
has accepted to pay every dime you spent on me,
translation.ko: 당신이 나한테 쓴 돈 전부 다 내겠다고 했어

translation.en: -I will pay you back. -No, no, no.
[in Kamtok] No, you can't utter such words.
I beg. [in Kamtok] Let me go.

translation.ko: 교육이 하는 일이 이런 거야? 그런 거야?

translation.en: -That man doesn't love you... -Please, hold it!
translation.ko: - 그 남자는 당신 사랑 안 해 - 제발 그만해

translation.en: [in English] Do I look like a kid? Oh, you want to teach me about love?
translation.ko: 내가 어린애 같아? 사랑이 뭔지 가르치려고?

translation.en: This whole place is a mental prison.
I wouldn't want her to suffocate in this madness.
translation.ko: 애가 이런 광기 속에 질식하게 둘 순 없어

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...than let you make the same mistakes as your mother.
translation.ko: 네가 엄마와 똑같은 실수를 하게 둘 순 없다

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You hear me? You hear me?!
-[in English] Thank you. -[in Kamtok] I'm sorry, too.
Didn't you say you do not want to go to school?
and made a big deal out of it.
When my father died in the fishing waters,
my uncle promised to send me to school.
He has been sending money for school fees, but my mom has been spending it.
translation.ko: 근데 학비로 쓰라고 보낸 돈을 엄마가 계속 쓴 거야

translation.en: Yesterday, after the fight, he bought me two uniforms,
translation.ko: 어제 두 분이 싸우신 끝에 삼촌이 교복 2벌 사 주시고

translation.en: then this morning he went and paid my school fees.
I had no idea what the teacher was saying.
[in Kamtok] I was in class but thinking about us.
How we were free and enjoying being by the seaside.
[teacher, in English] What are the factors of six?
What are the factors of six?
[teacher] Factors of six, I started with one.
[teacher] So the factors of six will be...
So, we have learned the factors of six.
[in Kamtok] Take this 300 francs and buy something for yourself.
translation.ko: 자, 여기 300이다 사고 싶은 거 사

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] Go home and cook, I'm hungry. -[in English] Papa, I already cooked.
translation.ko: - 집에 가서 요리해라, 배고프다 - 밥은 다 해놨어요

translation.en: -How about dirty clothes then? -Alreadty washed them.
[in Kamtok] OK. Go home and have some deserved rest.
[teacher, in English] If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
how many minutes will four boys take to clear that same portion of land?
translation.ko: 같은 땅을 4명이 개간한다면 몇 분이 걸릴까?

translation.en: If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ko: 같은 땅을 4명이 개간한다면 몇 분이 걸릴까?

translation.en: -Two hours to clear a hectare of land... -[Ekah] Thirty minutes!
I was thinking you'd forgotten about me.
This fish keeps reducing every day. Are you sure this is fish for 2,000 francs?
You can't tell me you learnt arithmetic by giving change to your customers.
translation.ko: 손님한테 거스름돈 주면서 산수를 배웠다는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I peep through the window every day to learn.
[in English] Is that how you learned arithmetic?
If one girl takes one hour to wash 50 plates...
translation.ko: 한 여자가 접시 50개 설거지에 1시간이 걸린다고 할 때

translation.en: how long will three girls take to wash those similar number of plates?
translation.ko: 같은 접시를 여자 셋이 설거지하면 시간이 얼마나 걸릴까?

translation.en: Four people are standing in line.
John is three meters behind Laura
and two meters in front of Peter.
Paul is four meters in front of Laura.
What is the distance between Peter and Paul?
Does your father know about this?
I need that money before the deadline.
translation.ko: 기한 전에 그 돈을 마련해야 해

translation.en: If I had that kind of money, Ekah would get a new fish barn.
translation.ko: 그런 돈이 있다면 에카한테 생선 묶는 끈을 사 줬지

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] What are you doing here? -[in English] Good afternoon.
-Do I need permission? -[in Kamtok] Not at all.
Just that people like you only come out on special occasions.
translation.ko: 선생 같은 사람이 오는 건 보기 드문 일이라서 그래요

translation.en: [in English] I came so that you and I could talk.
[in Kamtok] If you have anything to say, tell him here.
[in English] I am not talking to you, please.
[in Kamtok] Teacher Bihbih, if there is something, just say it here.
translation.ko: 비비 선생 용건이 있으면 그냥 여기서 말해요

translation.en: Have a seat, so you can be offered a drink.
-Have a seat. -[in English] No, I'm fine. Thank you.
Actually, I came so that you and I could talk something very important about your daughter.
translation.ko: 따님에 관한 아주 중요한 얘기를 나누고 싶어서 왔어요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] In my family, we do not cheat.
The fish we give you is the right size.
translation.ko: 선생한테 주는 생선이나 다른 사람들 생선이나 똑같다고요

translation.en: We thank God. [in Kamtok] Have a glass of palm wine.
translation.ko: 다행이군요, 야자주 한잔 들어요 - 여기요! - 고맙지만 괜찮아요

translation.en: that child, she could be the next big thing in this village.
translation.ko: 몇 년 뒤 이 마을에서 엄청나게 큰 화제가 될 겁니다

translation.en: [in Kamtok] All this time that I taught,
I had no idea Ekah watched through a hole to learn.
[in English] My Ekah come to your school?
And the good thing about it is, I asked some very hard question today...
translation.ko: 게다가 대단한 건 오늘 정말 어려운 걸 물었는데 맞혔다는 거예요
오늘 정말 어려운 걸 물었는데 맞혔다는 거예요

translation.en: And to even be more sure, I asked more question...
translation.ko: 확실히 하려고 몇 개 더 물어봤는데

translation.en: [in Kamtok] ...and she answered all of them.
Are you out of your mind?
translation.ko: 정신이 나갔어요? 머리가 어떻게 된 겁니까?

translation.en: [in English] I'm not joking. I'm very serious.
In fact, you should get her enrolled in school.
She could benefit from the opportunities, other people, in school.
translation.ko: 학교에 계신 분들한테서 많은 기회를 받을 수 있거든요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Why do bad luck always choose your house?
translation.ko: 왜 너희 집에는 늘 불운이 찾아오는 거냐?

translation.en: [in English] Again and again. [in Kamtok] Before it was Barbara,
[in English] My Ekah go to school?
If school was that good, you will not be dressed like this.
translation.ko: 학교가 올바른 곳이면 선생 옷차림이 이렇진 않겠죠

translation.en: You look like a replica of Pinocchio! Nonsense, sit down!
translation.ko: 무슨 피노키오처럼 입고선! 가만히 앉아 있어요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You want to become like your mother?
-[in English] No, Papa. No. -[in Kamtok] You want to be stubborn? Lay down there!
[in Kamtok] Will you set your foot in that school again? [in English] No, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Will you go to that class again?
-I can't hear you! -I will never go there again, Papa!
Will I see you in that school again? I will never go there again, Papa! I promise!
translation.ko: - 그 학교에서 또 눈에 띌 거야? - 아뇨, 안 갈게요

translation.en: -Solo, you are a strong man. -[Ekah crying]
-You are a strong man. -[Ekah continues crying]
Solo, you are a strong man.
[in Kamtok] I want to warn you to stay away from my family.
Don't put your madness in my daughter's head.
translation.ko: 당신 광기를 내 딸 머리에 집어넣지 말아요

translation.en: I love her the way she is.
I'm warning you for the last time.
This is what I don't like.
[in Kamtok] You are becoming too stubborn.
Ekah got me really angry. I got her well beaten.
translation.ko: 너무 화가 나서 매질을 좀 했어

translation.en: I witnessed it. You did the right thing.
I do the same to my boys when they are stubborn.
Anchor the canoe on the other side.
When I remember what my Barbara do for me,
translation.ko: 바버라가 나한테 한 짓을 생각해 봐

translation.en: and I see Ekah do the same things,
translation.ko: 그런데 이제 딸이 똑같이 하려 해

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I didn't know I still had this much anger in me.
translation.ko: 아직도 분노가 이렇게 많이 남은 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: [in English] No worry, Solo. No worry.
You need to keep this kid on her toes.
Don't let her become like your wife, Barbara.
translation.ko: 네 아내 바버라처럼 되게 내버려 두지 마

translation.en: If I were you, I would desecrate on Barbara's grave.
translation.ko: 내가 너라면 바버라 무덤도 훼손할 거야

translation.en: [in English] Teach sense in her head.
So how are you managing with the school?
Everything is going on fine in your absence, sir.
translation.ko: 교장 선생님이 안 계셔도 잘 관리하고 있었어요
비 선생, 알고 있겠지만 이 학교는 피땀과 눈물로 세운 겁니다

translation.en: was established out of sweat, tears, and blood.
translation.ko: 이 학교는 피땀과 눈물로 세운 겁니다

translation.en: I fought through a battle of hell to get these fish people,
translation.ko: 이 어촌에서 우리 학교의 뿌리를 내리기 위해

translation.en: to establish the roots of the school here.
I will do everything possible not to get into trouble with them.
translation.ko: 그러니 주민과 문제를 일으키지 않도록 노력해야 합니다

translation.en: Now I have been informed that there's a girl here by the name of Ekah,
who has been attending classes without her father's permission--
translation.ko: 아버지 허락도 안 받고 수업을 듣고 있었다더군요

translation.en: We'll not establish any confrontational habits in front of these people.
translation.ko: 주민들과 대립하는 관례가 생겨서는 안 됩니다

translation.en: No child will step his or her feet on these premises
translation.ko: 부모의 동의 없이는 어떤 아이도 이 학교에

translation.en: I chose you as the lone teacher of this school,
translation.ko: 당신을 이 학교의 유일한 선생으로 뽑은 건

translation.en: not because your performance was outstanding amongst delegation,
translation.ko: 대표단 중에서 성과가 가장 뛰어나서가 아니라

translation.en: Do not make me have a rethink.
So what were you going to say?
And how are the children fairing-- Are they getting set for the exams?
translation.ko: 애들은 어때요? 시험 준비를 잘하고 있나요?

translation.en: I'm doing my very best, sir.
You may go back to class.
[Bihbih] If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ko: 같은 땅을 4명이 개간한다면 몇 분이 걸릴까?

translation.en: If a boy takes two hours to clear a hectare of land,
how many minutes will four boys take to clear this same portion of land?
translation.ko: 같은 땅을 4명이 개간한다면 몇 분이 걸릴까?

translation.en: Have you taken the medicine I prepared for you?
[in Kamtok] Did you manage to cook food?
[in Kamtok] I did everything as assigned,
I even mended a few nets.
I think I can go fishing with you tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 같이 고기 잡으러 가도 될 거 같아요

translation.en: Huh, heat my food, I'm hungry.
I knew you would be coming back at this time.
[in English] But... [in Kamtok] It's good you take a shower first, before I serve your food.
translation.ko: 하지만 밥상 차릴 동안 일단 씻으세요

translation.en: Warm water is already in the bathroom.
[in Kamtok] Teacher. Please, I want to learn.
I cannot help you as it is.
We cannot even be seen together.
[in Kamtok] They say those who go to school can change their families...
translation.ko: 학교에 다니는 사람은 가족도 변화하게 할 수 있대요

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] Teacher, please help me. -[in English] Wake up. Wake up. Wake up.
You don't have to kneel before I help you.
translation.ko: 돕지도 않았는데 무릎 꿇을 필요 없어

translation.en: I freely want to help you, Ekah.
But it's not in my power to do that.
You don't want me losing my job, do you?
translation.ko: 내가 직장에서 잘리는 걸 원하는 건 아니지?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] How are you? Have you brought my brother's money?
translation.ko: - 잘 지냈나? - 우리 형 돈은 가져왔어요?

translation.en: That's why I have come to see you,
so together we can come to a one-time solution.
translation.ko: 함께 해결책을 연구해 보려고 자네랑 둘이서

translation.en: Many days have elapsed, and you still haven't brought my money.
translation.ko: 며칠이 지났는데도 내 돈을 안 가져왔군요

translation.en: -You think I'm stupid, right? -[in English] No. No...
translation.ko: - 그래 - 내가 바본 줄 알아요? 아니야, 그렇게 생각 안 해

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I can call two of my boys, to roughen you up. Yes.
translation.ko: - 애들 불러서 혼 좀 내야겠네요 - 맞아요

translation.en: I think it's time I allow Mustapha to deal with you.
translation.ko: 무스타파가 당신을 상대할 때가 된 것 같군요

translation.en: I came here for a reason.

translation.ko: 제발 내 말 좀 들어 봐

translation.en: What I have to tell you is better than money.
[in Kamtok] You take us for fools?
[in Kamtok] Sule, this guy wants to sell us wood.
No, I don't want to sell you wood. Mr. Sule, look.
translation.ko: 아니, 땔감 팔려는 거 아니야 술레, 들어 봐

translation.en: You have a good heart. Just like that of Jesus Christ.
translation.ko: 마음이 따뜻하지 우리 주 예수 그리스도처럼

translation.en: -Jesus Christ? -[in English] No. -[in Kamtok] You call me Jesus Christ? -[in English] No. No.
[in Kamtok] I wanted to say, you have a good heart like Prophet Muhammad.
translation.ko: 예언자 무함마드처럼 선한 마음을 갖고 있다고

translation.en: Both of you have a heart like that of Prophet Muhammad.
translation.ko: 너희 둘 다 예언자 무함마드 같은 마음을 갖고 있어

translation.en: That's what I wanted to say.
You say I have a heart,
-like that of Prophet Muhammad? -Yes, that's true.
A good heart like that of Holy Prophet Muhammad. I swear.
What do you want to tell me, that is better than my money?
translation.ko: 그 얘기가 왜 돈보다 괜찮은 거죠?

translation.en: It's a private talk, just our ears.
[in English] Who can come up to the board and show us how to solve this?
translation.ko: 칠판으로 나와서 이거 풀어 볼 사람?

translation.en: Can someone come up to the board
and show us how to solve this simple problem?
translation.ko: 이 간단한 문제 풀어 볼 사람?

translation.en: This is something we have been studying for weeks,
translation.ko: 몇 주 동안 계속 공부했던 거고

translation.en: and this is the same thing that will come in your exams next week.
Can anyone come up to the board and show us how to solve this?
translation.ko: 칠판 앞으로 나와서 이거 풀어 볼 사람 없어?

translation.en: I taught you this some weeks ago,
so everybody should be able to come to the board to solve this.
translation.ko: 누구든 칠판 앞으로 나와서 풀 수 있어야 해

translation.en: I taught you this a while ago and nobody can remember. Show me your hand.
translation.ko: 가르쳐 준 건데 아무도 몰라? 손바닥 내

translation.en: Next, next... show me your hand.
How you come back so quick so?
-[in Kamtok] How did the exams go? -Solomon, I told you my name is not Barbara.
translation.ko: - 시험은 잘 봤어? - 바버라라고 부르지 마

translation.en: There is, but it's still cold.
[in English] So you expect me to come back from school and eat cold food?
If you wait, ma'a, I finish sewing my trousa, I-I will warm it for you.
Why is it so difficult for you to understand simple teachings?
translation.ko: 간단한 거 하나 이해하는 것도 그렇게 어려워?

translation.en: Illiteracy, they say, is brother to madness.
[in Wum] It can't happen to my daughter...
translation.ko: 내 딸은 그렇게 되면 안 돼

translation.en: [in Wum] Who's a big fool now?
[in English] What are you doing here at this time?
I thought I told you we cannot be seen together.
translation.ko: 같이 있는 모습 보이면 안 된다고 했잖아

translation.en: Then what are you doing here at this time, alone?
translation.ko: 그런데 이 시간에 여기서 혼자 뭐 해?

translation.en: You're good in calculations, but you're still lagging in reading and spelling.
translation.ko: 산수는 잘하지만 읽고 쓰는 건 아직 서툴구나

translation.en: Ekah, I thought I told you we can't--
[in Kamtok] I will do whatever you want.
[Bihbih, in English] Just teaching how to sound.
If you put it together, it will give you "sh."
You have to put your mouth like this. "Shh."
"If one man can destroy the world,
why can't one girl change it?”
Let me rush to the meeting before it starts raining.
translation.ko: 비 오기 전에 회의 갔다 오마

translation.en: You understand? Huh. I will be back.
I will check it when I rest, OK?
If I ask you a question?
[Bihbih] Malala Yousafzai is a Pakistani girl,
who became an advocate for girls' education,
even when since she was still young.
This resulted to the Taliban terrorist group
issuing a death threat against her.
She was known for her focus,
her determination and her wish for every girl child to be educated.
translation.ko: 모든 여자아이가 교육받을 것을 불굴의 투지로 주장했거든

translation.en: even after she was shot by this terrorist group because of her views.
translation.ko: 테러 집단의 총을 맞고도 그 뜻을 굽히지 않았어

translation.en: The extremists are afraid of books and pens.
The power of education frightens them.
-Where is Ekah? -[in English] What nonsense is this?
[in Kamtok] You think I came here for jokes?
-[in English] Ekah is not here. -[Lucas] Bihbih?
[in English] We'll look inside room. No one should step into my room.
translation.ko: - 방 좀 볼게요 - 내 방엔 아무도 못 들어가요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She is not here, Lucas. Let's go home.
translation.ko: 여기 없어 루커스, 그만 집에 가자

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I will beat you until your mother's bad genes are out.
translation.ko: 네 엄마의 나쁜 유전자가 사라질 때까지 때려 주마

translation.en: [in English] What have you done? What have you done!
translation.ko: 무슨 짓을 한 겁니까? 말해 보세요!

translation.en: You disrespect me and you put this entire institution into jeopardy?
translation.ko: 날 무시하고 학교 전체를 위험에 빠뜨린 겁니까?

translation.en: -Sir, this kid is different. -So bloody what?
translation.ko: - 그 애는 특별해요 - 젠장! 그래서 어쩌라고요?

translation.en: We will not stake this school
translation.ko: 여자애 하나 때문에 이 학교와 다른 애들의 미래를

translation.en: and the future of every other children because of one girl.
translation.ko: 여자애 하나 때문에 이 학교와 다른 애들의 미래를 위태롭게 할 순 없어요

translation.en: Hear me out. I repeat. We will not!
translation.ko: 다시 한번 말하죠 절대 용납 못 합니다!

translation.en: But I didn't even teach her on the premise.
Who bloody cares where you taught her?
I can see you prefer your little tangle of that little fish girl
translation.ko: 그 꼬맹이 어부 딸과 시시덕거리는 게

translation.en: rather than the interest of this institution. Isn't that so?
translation.ko: 학교 전체의 이익보다 중요한 거 같군요

translation.en: I have had it up to here. I've had it up to here because of your insubordination.
translation.ko: 선생의 불복종을 그간 참은 게 여기까지 찼어요

translation.en: I'm writing against you. I'm writing a letter against you to the inspector of basic education. Have you heard me?
translation.ko: 기본 교육 감사관에게 편지를 써서 고발할 겁니다

translation.en: She is a child like every other, and she came to me, not once, not twice.
translation.ko: 그 애도 다른 애와 똑같아요 한두 번 찾아온 것도 아니고요

translation.en: She has every right to be educated like every other child.
translation.ko: 에카도 다른 애들처럼 교육받을 권리가 있어요

translation.en: I will not fall for that emotional blackmail. Have you heard me?
translation.ko: 그딴 감정적인 읍소엔 넘어가지 않을 겁니다, 알겠어요?

translation.en: You will not remain employed in these premises, not any longer.
translation.ko: 선생은 이 학교에서 더는 일 못 하게 될 겁니다

translation.en: I will use every connection I can muster to remove you,
translation.ko: 동원할 수 있는 모든 연줄을 활용해서 선생이 이 학교를 망치기 전에 내보내겠어요
선생이 이 학교를 망치기 전에 내보내겠어요

translation.en: If you like use all the networks you have.
And you, what are you looking at, look forward.
This is not good at all.
This is terrible, and bad for our image.
translation.ko: 성적이 형편없으면 학교 이미지에 도움이 안 돼요

translation.en: This just goes to show how unserious we are.
translation.ko: 우리가 제대로 못 한다는 걸 보여줄 뿐입니다

translation.en: But I've been doing my best, sir.
Well, your best is clearly not good enough, Madam Bih.
It's obvious. It shows in their results.
Very appalling results. Not even 12 over 20?
translation.ko: 아주 끔찍한 결과입니다 20개 중 12개도 못 맞혀요?

translation.en: This automatically just disqualifies us from Bamenda.
translation.ko: 이러면 바멘다 대회에서 바로 예선 탈락이에요

translation.en: I am not happy. I am not happy with you at all.
Ha. How come you say there is no one brilliant among the student?
This is a very good result.
Yes, it's very good and it gives us a ray of hope. You should work on her.
translation.ko: 희망의 한 줄기 빛이 비치네요 얘를 다듬어요

translation.en: This is very good. Work on her some more.
That is the score she had in the same exam our pupils took.
translation.ko: 학생들과 똑같은 시험을 쳐서 받은 성적입니다

translation.en: But, sir, she can still stand in.
Is it that I talk too fast or you listen too slow?
translation.ko: 내 말이 빠른 겁니까 선생이 이해를 못 하는 겁니까?

translation.en: Rules are rules and we are not going to break them, do you understand me?
translation.ko: 규칙은 규칙이고 그걸 어기는 일은 없습니다

translation.en: You must do everything in your power to prepare a registered kid.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 정규 학생 중에 하나 골라서 준비시키세요

translation.en: Those people have not still fixed the light?
I looked for you at the seaside today to no avail.
I decided to stay home and keep an eye on Ekah.
She has been locked up in the room.
How long will you keep an eye on her?
but bad things keep happening to me.
[in English] I think, say, I know how we can handle this Ekah matter.
translation.ko: 에카의 지금 상황을 해결할 방법이 있어

translation.en: we should give her to someone who can control her better.
translation.ko: 에카를 더 잘 다스릴 수 있는 사람한테 보내야 해

translation.en: [in English] You want me to give Ekah for marriage?
Marry her off at this age?
If you marry her off, the responsibility will not be on you anymore.
translation.ko: 결혼시키면 더는 네가 책임지지 않아도 돼

translation.en: The shame wouldn't be on you, like the case of your late wife, Barbara.
translation.ko: 네 죽은 아내 바버라처럼 수치를 당할 일이 없다고

translation.en: I don't want anyone to abuse my child.
[in English] Leave that all for me.
[in Kamtok] I will fix that. You can count on me.
Look, Solo, [in English] I like the way you'd handle Ekah matter.
translation.ko: 솔로, 네가 에카를 다루는 방식은 마음에 들어

translation.en: [in Kamtok] You are a strong man.
Our late parents must be very proud of you.
[man on phone] Good afternoon, Mr. Anang.
I trust you and your family are very well.
I am calling with respect to the Bamenda event.
and we're looking forward to receiving your representative as soon as you can.
translation.ko: 가능한 한 빨리 대표를 보내 주길 기다리겠습니다

translation.en: Nine days from now, and all eyes are on the new institution,
translation.ko: 앞으로 9일 남았죠 다들 신규 학교, 특히 당신 학교를 주목하고 있어요
다들 신규 학교, 특히 당신 학교를 주목하고 있어요

translation.en: Have a nice day, Mr. Anang.
You too, sir. Than you very much, sir.
Who was that on the phone?
We had a meeting last week and I spoke very highly and proudly of the school.
translation.ko: 지난주에 회의에 가서 우리 학교를 엄청 자랑했거든

translation.en: Because of that, all eyes are directed on us,
translation.ko: 그것 때문에 모든 이목이 우리한테 집중됐어

translation.en: especially with the coming of the Bamenda Brain Box Competition.
translation.ko: 특히 바멘다 영재 대회를 앞두고 기대가 크지

translation.en: You speak like the children are not ready.
So, what are you going to do now?
You didn't get a glass for yourself?
Do you know the meaning of LCM?
What is the meaning of HCF?
You don't know the meaning of HCF?
You don't know the meaning of LCM or HCF?
Let me ask you something very simple.
what is the past participle of, uh, "see"?
Can-can you even spell your name?
Flown out potatoes. That's what they are.
Not even one of them can try?
translation.ko: 대회 나갈 애가 한 명도 없어?

translation.en: Not even one. They don't even know what LCM is.
translation.ko: 한 명도 없어 최소공배수가 뭔지도 몰라

translation.en: Not to even talk of... a long and short division.
If you ask them the past participle of "see," they will say,
just call the board of inspectors and tell them you are not yet set.
translation.ko: 감사단에 전화해서 준비가 안 됐다고 해야겠네

translation.en: That is not even an option right now.
I know you are a man of integrity,
translation.ko: 당신이 신의를 지키는 사람인 건 알지만

translation.en: but I think you should consider considering that, uh...
translation.ko: 이제는 대안을 고려해 봐야 할 것 같아

translation.en: I think she's your ace card at the moment.
translation.ko: 지금은 그 애가 당신의 에이스 카드 같아

translation.en: I cannot believe you uttered such nonsense.
translation.ko: 그런 헛소리를 하다니 아주 기가 막힌다

translation.en: The school must be represented at the Brain Box competition.
translation.ko: 영재 대회에는 학교 대표를 내보내야 해

translation.en: That's why he deemed it necessary to call me in the first place,
even though the event is on the calendar,
and I was there at the planning meeting last month.
He wants to have it on record that I failed.
translation.ko: 내가 실패했다는 기록을 남기고 싶은 거지

translation.en: Anyway, you either use the little girl Ekah,
translation.ko: 어쨌든 그 에카라는 애를 안 내보내면

translation.en: or face the shame of your school not being represented
translation.ko: 당신 학교에선 올해 대회에 출전 못 할 거고

translation.en: I am off to the kitchen.
-Would you like to come inside? -Oh, no. No, no, no.
Let's-- Let's-- We can talk about it here.
First of all, uh, let me,
let me apologize profusely for the way I talked to you the last time.
translation.ko: 지난번에 선생을 대했던 내 말투를 사과하고 싶군요

translation.en: I am really sorry, it was, uh...
At this point, I just-- I've come to realize the frustrations and the...
translation.ko: 이제야 아이들을 가르치면서 선생이 느꼈을 좌절감과

translation.en: yearnings of a tutor when she finds a brilliant kid,
translation.ko: 반대로 똑똑한 학생을 만났을 때 가르침의 갈망이

translation.en: as she tries to impart them.
I am at a crossroad here,
it's either we win it all,
If I may confide in you, please tell me,
what do you think of this girl Diana?
Actually, sir, she is very good.
I've covered more with her than the other pupils in my class.
translation.ko: 다른 학생들보다 걔한테 가르친 게 더 많아요

translation.en: could you reach out to her parents and get their consent?
translation.ko: 그 애 부모님께 동의를 받아줄 수 있겠어요?

translation.en: We are not only going to the Brain competition to participate,
translation.ko: 우린 영재 대회에 단순히 참가하는 게 아닙니다

translation.en: we must make a memorable impression.
[in Kamtok] have decided you will go live with Alhaji Sule.
-[in English] Why? -You will be woman, my dear.
[Lucas] That will happen for all woman. You be woman now.
translation.ko: 여자는 다 그런 거다 너도 이제 여자야

translation.en: No, [in Kamtok] I am a girl.
Any girl who is as stubborn as you, is not a girl anymore.
translation.ko: 너처럼 고집이 세면 더는 아이로 안 봐줘

translation.en: Papa. Please, I will never visit teacher Bihbih again.
translation.ko: 아빠, 제발요 비비 선생님 집에 안 갈게요

translation.en: This is the best thing for you.
Everyone knows Alhaji Sule is a rich man.
translation.ko: 알하지 술레가 부자란 건 누구나 알아

translation.en: [in English] Now fine married, he go take care for you.
translation.ko: 좋은 사람이니 너도 잘 보살필 거다

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I'm not ready to have a child. I will not be stubborn anymore.
translation.ko: 애 낳을 준비 안 됐어요 다시는 고집 안 피울게요

translation.en: Don't abandon me. I will never go to that school.
translation.ko: 저 버리지 마세요 그 학교 다신 안 갈게요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Papa, please don't abandon me.
I will not be your papa again.
Papa, I promise you, I will never touch any book.
translation.ko: 아빠, 책 같은 건 이제 절대로 안 건드릴게요

translation.en: [in English] I swear to God, I'm not going to even look at Teacher Bihbih again. Look, Papa, I beg you.
translation.ko: 신께 맹세할게요 비비 선생은 쳐다도 안 볼게요

translation.en: Papa, please don't do this to me.
I want to see Mr. Solomon.
[in English] Why you want to see?
-[in Kamtok] How else do you want us-- -[in English] Please.
There is a competition coming up, and she stands the chance to win.
translation.ko: 곧 대회가 열리는데 에카는 우승할 가능성이 있어요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Ekah is not one of your students.
But the most important thing is
translation.ko: 하지만 중요한 건 에카를 학생으로 등록시키면

translation.en: we can get her registered and then she will be a part of the--
translation.ko: 하지만 중요한 건 에카를 학생으로 등록시키면 - 대회에 나갈 수... - 안 돼요

translation.en: She stands the chance to win 150,000 francs.
translation.ko: 에카가 우승하면 상금 15만 프랑을 받을 수 있고

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Those are little tricks for kids.
Why would they give Ekah 150,000 when you can keep it to yourself?
translation.ko: 15만 프랑이면 자기가 갖지 왜 에카한테 주겠어요?

translation.en: Leave this place. Don't disturb my peace again.
translation.ko: 그만 가세요 - 심란하게 하지 말고 - 선생님!

translation.en: [Ekah, in English] Teacher Bihbih, Teacher Bihbih. [in Kamtok] Teacher, please don't leave me here.
translation.ko: 비비 선생님! 절 두고 가지 마세요

translation.en: -Ekah... -They locked me up in the room.
Why you have to lock her up?
Why do you people have to lock her up?
translation.ko: - 왜 가뒀죠? - 선생이 알 바 아녜요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] It's none of your business. Nobody invited you into this.
translation.ko: - 왜 가뒀죠? - 선생이 알 바 아녜요 부르지도 않았는데 오고

translation.en: [in English] Mr. Lucas, this-- this is barbaric.
[in English] I don't want marriage, I don't want marriage.
You cannot be doing this kind of thing. She is only 12. Lucas--
translation.ko: 이런 짓을 하면 안 돼요 겨우 12살이잖아요, 루커스!

translation.en: I am very well respected here.
If I ask anyone to jump, they jump.
If I tell them to eat debris, they do it without hesitation.
translation.ko: 쓰레기를 먹으라고 하면 주저하지 않고 먹고요

translation.en: Don't come here and try to tell me what to do.
This is none of your business. Leave this place.
Lucas, you cannot marry her off.
She is only 12. I cannot accept that. I cannot accept that.
translation.ko: 겨우 12살이잖아요! 그런 건 용납할 수 없어요!

translation.en: Lucas, I cannot accept it. You cannot marry Ekah off.
translation.ko: 용납할 수 없어요 에카를 시집보내면 안 돼요

translation.en: You cannot do that. This is barbaric. This is barbaric.
Cross the line. [in Kamtok] I dare you to cross that line.
Madam Bih. [in English] Please tell me something good.
They have locked her up waiting to be delivered to her husband, sir.
translation.ko: 애를 방에 가둬 두고 시집보내려고 해요

translation.en: How can people be so evil?
It's a common practice for them.
Most of the young girls don't even see anything wrong with it.
translation.ko: 여자애들 대부분은 이게 잘못된 건지도 몰라요

translation.en: And what really squeezes my heart is, how they want to bury such a dream.
translation.ko: 정말 비통한 건 애들이 꿈조차 쉽게 묻어버리는 현실이죠

translation.en: I can't think, sir. I ca-- I can't think.
Please, sir, can I have some water to drink?
-Search the whole house. -Are you out of your mind?
If I hear pin from you again,
[in Kamtok] you will know what I am capable of!
[in English] Ekah is not here. I've had enough of this brutality.
translation.ko: 에카는 여기 없어요 잔인한 짓엔 신물이 나네요

translation.en: Don't even try me yet! Don't even try me!
[Bihbih] I said, Ekah is not here.
I told you Ekah is not here, now leave my house.
translation.ko: 에카는 없다고 했잖아요 그만 나가 주세요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Bihbih, my brother, Sule must have his bride.
translation.ko: 비비, 우리 형 술레는 신부를 맞이해야 합니다

translation.en: Let's go before Ekah runs too far.
If I find out you helped Ekah to run away from marriage,
translation.ko: 에카가 결혼 안 하고 도망가게 도와준 거라면

translation.en: You understand? I will shut it down.
-Hello, uncle. -[in English] You don't see Ekah?
[in Kamtok] I just saw her running towards the seaside.
Can you help me cross to the other side?
Are you talking about Solomon's daughter?
We have to cross over. There's no time.
Or is she hiding somewhere here?
She crossed over, sir. With another canoeist--
translation.ko: 건너갔어요 다른 사람이 모는 카누를 타고요

translation.en: Do you know this other canoeist...
What's his name again, I think Efofa?
[in Kamtok] Grand, grand, I am not lying, she crossed over.
[in English] Why are you looking me so, grand? You look me as you think I lie.
I swear to God, if I am lying, let my mother be stricken by thunder.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마가 벼락을 맞는다 해도 그게 사실이에요, 진짜로요

translation.en: -What are you doing? -[in English] Remove your clothes!
If I tell you I am not confused, then I'll be a liar.
We stand to lose a lot if we do not participate.
translation.ko: 대회에 안 나가면 많은 걸 잃게 될 거예요

translation.en: We stand to be mocked and undermined if we send in a dormant candidate.
translation.ko: 실력 없는 후보를 보내면 조롱당하고 평판이 깎일 거고

translation.en: we cannot go for a competition for another three years, so tell me...
translation.ko: 앞으로 3년 동안 대회에 참가할 수 없으니

translation.en: what kind of miracle should we be expecting
to at least represent us in an average way?
translation.ko: 최소한 평균 성적이라도 낼 수 있겠나요?

translation.en: Ekah is completely out of the question now.

translation.ko: - 세상에, 이런 - 도저히 이해할 수가 없죠

translation.en: -That's so sad. -But we have two more options.
translation.ko: - 정말 슬프군요 - 두 가지 대안이 있어요

translation.en: The first will be a miracle.
We somehow convince Alhaji Sule to enrol Ekah.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 알하지 술레를 설득해서 에카를 등록시키는 거예요

translation.en: That will be definitely be an earth-shaking one.
translation.ko: 하늘이 두 쪽 나야 가능한 일이군요

translation.en: -Fine. How are you guys? -We are very fine.
translation.ko: - 잘 잤지, 자네들은 어때? - 아주 좋죠

translation.en: You gave me a sweet girl.
I can have her all day. No breaks.
translation.ko: 잠시도 안 쉬고 종일이라도 할 수 있겠어요

translation.en: She tasted like fresh cocoa yam mixed with palm oil.
translation.ko: 애가 아주 야자유를 섞은 신선한 타로 맛이라니까요?

translation.en: -[both laugh] -Didn't I tell you? I told you.
I have not been out of this house in three days.
translation.ko: 3일 동안 집에서 한 발자국도 안 나왔어요

translation.en: The wine is too sweet to go anywhere.
translation.ko: 와인이 너무 달콤해서 어디 가질 못하겠네요

translation.en: -You have done me well. I will be back. -OK.
-I have a gift for you. -OK. Waiting.
[in Kamtok] You paid your debt very well. [in English] Thank you. Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you...
[in Kamtok] When you give me something nice, I have to return that favor.
translation.ko: 나한테 좋은 걸 줬으니 나도 보답을 해야죠

translation.en: -[in Kamtok] You are a good brother. -Thanks and you, too.
He rapes me every-- every day.
[in Kamtok] Please forgive me for anything I have done wrong to you.
translation.ko: 제가 잘못한 일은 모두 용서해 주세요

translation.en: Does your husband know you are here?
Your husband will not kill you. [in English] You hear me?
translation.ko: 남편이 널 죽이진 않을 거다 알겠니?

translation.en: What is it again? What is it?
Solomon, do you think I am stupid?
I have told you people that I'm not a fool.
Nobody can play over my intelligence.
translation.ko: 아무도 날 갖고 놀 순 없어요

translation.en: Why are talking you to me like a mad man?
Did you just call me a mad man?
Because I can show you real madness right now.
translation.ko: 진짜 미친 게 뭔지 어디 제대로 한번 보여 줘요?

translation.en: You always come here to look for your wife.
Your wife is under your care. Not mine.
translation.ko: 네 아내는 네가 알아서 관리해 내 소관 아니야

translation.en: I am giving you two options.
you and your brother will bring my wife back.
Repay all the money you took from me.
translation.ko: 나한테 빌려 간 돈 한 푼도 안 빼놓고 다 갚는다

translation.en: If you guys don't do any of these, heads will roll.
translation.ko: 뭐든 안 하면 잘린 머리가 여기저기 굴러다니게 될 거예요

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Didn't I tell you, in case of any issues, you should contact me first?
translation.ko: 문제가 생기면 나한테 와서 해결하자고 했잖아

translation.en: -Why did you bring it to my brother? -No, no, no.
I am not leaving without my wife.
Sule, what is going on here? I am lost.
translation.ko: 술레, 이게 다 뭐야? 무슨 말인지 모르겠어

translation.en: Then he borrowed more money from me.
Totaling 150,000 francs, so he gave me your daughter as payment.
[in Kamtok] If I don't see my money or my beautiful wife,
translation.ko: 내 돈을 내놓든가 내 이쁜 아내를 내놔요
- 아니면 이 녀석 죽여버릴 거예요 - 그렇군

translation.en: You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
You used my daughter to pay off your debt?
Bro, go home. I'll fix this.
translation.ko: 동생아, 집에 가 있어 내가 해결할게

translation.en: Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
-Andong. What is it? -Ekah. Ekah. Ekah is at Pa Juh.
translation.ko: - 안동, 왜 그러니? - 에카가 파주에 있어요

translation.en: [woman, in English] What number must be multiplied by four
Fred does two sit-ups in January,
how many sit-ups will Fred do in May and June combined?
translation.ko: 5월과 6월에는 윗몸일으키기를 총 몇 개 하게 될까요?

translation.en: Derick. How many days and hours are equal to 200 hours?
Now, we will give room for each candidate to pose a question
translation.ko: 이번에는 두 후보가 상대에게 문제를 내면서

translation.en: If a candidate answers their opponent's question,
and this opponent fails to answer the other candidate's question,
that candidate will be crowned winner.
Now, Mr. Derick, your last question to Ms. Ekah.
translation.ko: 이제 데릭 군이 에카 양에게 마지막 문제를 내겠습니다

translation.en: True or false. The name "Teddy bear" is used to describe a soft toy bear.
translation.ko: 참/거짓 문제입니다 곰 인형을 뜻하는 '테디 베어'는

translation.en: The name comes from President Theodore "Teddy" Roosevelt,
who once set a bear cub free.
[Ekah] The youngest woman who win the...
The youngest woman to win the Nobel Peace Prize, is who?
translation.ko: 노벨 평화상을 최연소로 수상한 이 여자는 누구입니까?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She was shot by the Taliban in 2012.
[in English] But she did not die.
[in Kamtok] My girl, Annabel must go to school.
[mouthing, in English] My name is Diana Ekah.
because... because I wanted to go school.
[in Kamtok] I know my father loves me.
Where I come from, the fish people
I can't even believe I'm standing here today as the best.
translation.ko: 오늘 여기서 최고에 오르다니 실감이 나지 않아요

translation.en: Best all-round student in a school such as this?
And thank you, Nnlom Nnam Hand For Children,
Most of you know my story.
Making it from the far-flung beach of Menchum right up to this podium,
translation.ko: 외딴 멘첨 어촌에서 태어난 사람이 이 연단에 섰으니

translation.en: in our body towards that passionate relentlessness,
who is ready to burn with you
towards the actualization of your dream.
For being my light in a place of no lights.
translation.ko: 빛이 없는 곳에서 내 빛이 되어 주셨죠

translation.en: I dedicate this today to you,
and may your soul rest in peace.
"There are two powers in this world."
Congratulations, Bodian Tech, and happy graduation to all of you.
translation.ko: 축하합니다, 보디언 기술대 여러분 모두 졸업 축하해요!

translation.en: And see you on the other side.
